title: Blackstone River Valley National Heritage Corridor: Support Your Park
body: Explore This Park    Get Involved     Support Your Park             Support Your Park         Volunteer Mike Ferry releases one of the trout he raises in his Woonsocket High School classroom into the Blackstone River.   The John H. Chafee Blackstone River Valley National Heritage Corridor is a partnership park, and we are constantly seeking new partners to work with. To learn about some of the ways you can work with the Heritage Corridor, please see one of the links to the right or visit www.blackstonevalleycorridor.org/getinvolved/
